entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0005.49] The date of 2024-12-20 used for Debt Instrument, Interest Rate, Stated Percentage and the Scenario [Axis] and srt:ScenarioForecastMember with a value of 0.05 is earlier than or the same as the reporting period end date of 2024-12-31. Either remove the statement scenario axis and forecast member from this value, change the end date for the value or update the Document and Entity Information document period end date.
The properties of this us-gaap:DebtInstrumentInterestRateStatedPercentage fact are: Period: 2024-12-20 Dimensions: srt:StatementScenarioAxis=srt:ScenarioForecastMember, us-gaap:LongtermDebtTypeAxis=us-gaap:MortgagesMember, srt:RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationDescriptionOfPropertyAxis=bxp:NineZeroOneNewYorkAvenueMember Unit: pure Rule version: 26.0.9 - bxp-20241231.htm 8

entry.message:

Either remove the statement scenario axis and forecast member from this value, change the end date for the value or update the Document and Entity Information document period end date.
